attributes.action: Bring back rent assessment as compulsory to stop spiralling private rented rents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel rent assessment should be compulsory on all private rented properties to put a stop to the stupid prices that private landlords are now getting away with under the housing allowance scheme. Spiralling prices makes it very difficult, if not impossible for low income families to afford a roof over there head without putting thereself in debt.
